message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. I think it's a fair price considering its worth, but I'm open to negotiations if you think otherwise.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $10000 is your maximum budget, but I still think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11500. I'm confident that you'll find it's a great value at this price.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $10750 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects the value of the item while staying within my financial limits.

I understand that you're trying to find a balance between value and budget, Bob. I'm willing to consider your offer, but I still think the product is worth more than $10750. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $11250. I think this is a fair compromise that reflects the product's value.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in trying to find a middle ground. Given my budget, I would like to propose a final price of $11000 for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise that respects the value of the item while staying within my financial means.

I understand that you're willing to compromise, Bob, but I'm not willing to go down to $11000. I'm willing to make one more offer to try to find a mutually beneficial price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11200. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
